tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE tour_packages (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    package_name VARCHAR(255),
    destination VARCHAR(255),
    duration INT,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE itineraries (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    package_id INT,
    day INT,
    activity VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (package_id) REFERENCES tour_packages(id)
);

CREATE TABLE tour_packages (
    package_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    package_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    destination VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE itineraries (
    itinerary_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    package_id INT NOT NULL,
    day_number INT NOT NULL,
    activity VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (package_id) REFERENCES tour_packages(package_id)
);

CREATE TABLE pricing_information (
    pricing_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    package_id INT NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE NOT NULL,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    currency VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (package_id) REFERENCES tour_packages(package_id)
);

CREATE TABLE tour_packages (
  package_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  package_name VARCHAR(50),
  destination VARCHAR(50),
  duration INT,
  price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE itineraries (
  itinerary_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  package_id INT,
  day_number INT,
  activity VARCHAR(100),
  FOREIGN KEY (package_id) REFERENCES tour_packages(package_id)
);

CREATE TABLE pricing_information (
  price_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  package_id INT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  price DECIMAL(10, 2),
  FOREIGN KEY (package_id) REFERENCES tour_packages(package_id)
);
CREATE TABLE tour_packages (tour_package_id INT PRIMARY KEY, tour_name VARCHAR(255), destination VARCHAR(255), duration INT, price DECIMAL);
CREATE TABLE itineraries (itinerary_id INT PRIMARY KEY, tour_package_id INT, day INT, activity VARCHAR(255), location VARCHAR(255), UNIQUE (tour_package_id, day));

CREATE TABLE pricing_information (pricing_id INT PRIMARY KEY, tour_package_id INT, price DECIMAL, discount DECIMAL, availability INT, FOREIGN KEY (tour_package_id) REFERENCES tour_packages(tour_package_id));

CREATE TABLE customer_bookings (booking_id INT PRIMARY KEY, tour_package_id INT, itinerary_id INT, customer_name VARCHAR(255), booking_date DATE, FOREIGN KEY (tour_package_id) REFERENCES tour_packages(tour_package_id), FOREIGN KEY (itinerary_id) REFERENCES itineraries(itinerary_id));
CREATE TABLE reviews (review_id INT PRIMARY KEY, tour_package_id INT, rating INT, feedback TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (tour_package_id) REFERENCES tour_packages(tour_package_id));
